message.content:
cs.CL, cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR 

This paper deals with the problem of building an AI system that can perform tasks involving vision and language, which is a common theme in the fields of natural language processing (NLP), computer vision (CV), and artificial intelligence (AI). Therefore, the most likely sub-categories are cs.CL (Computation and Language), cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition), and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). The paper also proposes a multi-task learning approach, which falls under the category of machine learning (ML) and specifically, deep learning. Therefore, cs.LG (Machine Learning) is also a likely sub-category. Finally, the paper involves analyzing the learned representation by visualizing attention maps, which is a common technique in information retrieval (IR). Therefore, cs.IR (Information Retrieval) is also a possible sub-category.
